item.title: My Journey Into Rust (pt 1)
item.description: Intro Link to heading Firstly, I’m back. I’ve been away for a while, I took a career break and got a dog. I rejoined the working world in January. In that time I also began learning Rust in depth. I had dabbled with it before, but I wanted to learn it properly. I didn’t/don’t expect it to replace my love of Go, maybe I can use both in the future.
